mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where id = #{id}

select cartno, id, contentsno, pname, amount, price, total, r from (select c.cartno, m.id, ct.contentsno, ct.pname, c.amount, ct.price, (ct.price*c.amount) as total, rownum r from member m, contents ct, cart c where m.id = c.id and c.contentsno = ct.contentsno and m.id = #{id})
where r >= #{sno} and r <= #{eno}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cartno = #{cartno} and contentsno = #{contentsno}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartno, id, contentsno, amount) values((select nvl(max(cartno),0)+1 from cart), #{id}, #{contentsno}, #{amount})
